items.title: Katy Perry is ‘psychologically’ preparing for her Blue Origin spaceflight with Lauren Sanchez by repeating affirmations and studying string theory
items.description: On Monday, she will join Jeff Bezos’ fiancee Lauren Sanchez, journalist Gayle King and three other women on an all-female Blue Origin spaceflight.

items.title: Ex-Abercrombie CEO charged with sex trafficking crimes is suffering from dementia and can’t stand trial, prosecutors and defense say
items.description: Former Abercrombie & Fitch CEO Michael Jeffries is suffering from dementia and isn't competent to stand trial on sex trafficking charges.

items.title: As JPMorgan, Wells Fargo and Morgan Stanley beat expectations, Jamie Dimon says he cares most that the ‘Western world stays together economically’
items.description: Mostly positive bank earnings were clouded by the chaotic start to Q2 and the murky economic outlook.

items.title: The U.S. dollar is losing its status as a safe haven thanks to Trump’s tariffs. What does that mean for investors?
items.description: The dollar is taking a beating as Trump's tariff policies cause widespread uncertainty, threatening its status as the world's reserve currency.

items.title: How does a Fortune 500 company rebuild its supply chain overnight? Most are piecing together a playbook on the fly
items.description: “Almost every client I talk to has a war room,” says Mary Rollman, KPMG’s U.S. supply-chain leader.
